page.title: 18TOURISM AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: MANY TOURISTS USE THE A7 AS IT IS DESIGNATED A SCENIC ROUTE FROM CARLISLE TO EDINBURGH AND CARRIES A LOT LESS TRAFFIC THAN THE MOTORWAYS. THIS TOGETHER WITH A GREAT VARIATION OF SCENERY MAKES A WELCOME ENTRY INTO SCOTLAND AND LEADS THEM TO THE KNITWEAR MANUFACTURING TOWN OF HAWICK. THE BED AND BREAKFAST ESTABLISHMENT PROVIDES A ROOM WITH SHARED BATHROOM AND A BREAKFAST OF CEREAL, BACON AND EGG, TOAST AND TEA IN THE MORNING FOR ABOUT Â£7.50 PER PERSON PER NIGHT. THE HOTEL PROVIDES SIMILAR ACCOMMODATION WITH BAR FACILITIES, A CHOICE OF EVENING MEALS, HAS PRIVATE BATHROOMS AND CHARGES Â£13 PER PERSON PER NIGHT. THESE BUSINESSES PROVIDE WORK FOR TWO FAMILIES AND OCCASIONAL EXTRA HELPERS AND SO HELP KEEP THE POPULATION STEADY.
